message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Final roll call: 8+1 + own Analysis Report">
FINAL ROLL CALL (experts only, not translator-2).

Confirm you have EXACTLY these in your context:
1. All 8 essays (关于集体利益, A Thought on Knowledge, 西西弗斯, 后形而上学 整理, 诗意, 范畴论与境 整理, K1策略, 零散想法)
2. 境集 index
3. YOUR OWN Analysis Report (NOT the translator's Memo.md)

Your Analysis Report is at:
/Users/el/Dropbox/10.Kernel/11.Vault/Tower/L. Legenravend/49 Workspace/[YOUR FIELD]/Analysis Report.md

Reply ONLY with:
"CONFIRM: 8+1 essays + [your field] Analysis Report loaded"

or

"MISSING: [what's missing]"
</teammate-message>

input.content: CONFIRM: 8+1 essays + Buddhism Analysis Report loaded
